name: Jack Big Chin: Alien Invasion
description:
Jack Big Chin: Alien Invasion is a hard action-adventure game inspired by the classics of the 90s, where you lead Jack on his missions, facing alien hordes to save the human race.
Unlock and upgrade your weapons, pass obstacles to collect power cells and activate cannons to fire at invaders.

• Platform challenges


• Hordes of enemies


• Bosses


• 10 weapons to unlock and upgrade
